package.name: irobot_hand_description
package.description: This package contains iRobot hand description files. The files should yield identical model as the the one provided by iRobot under the name handle_description with a couple of changes: Currently, we are working on updating the inertia to be more realistic. The meshes have been post processed with regenerated face and vertex normals. Gazebo elements have been added for simulation needs.
package.author: Brian Gerkey and John Hsu
